intro: Icostegia, commonly known as the velvetleaf, is a tropical plant belonging to the Malvaceae family. It is characterized by its large, heart-shaped leaves that are velvety to the touch. The plant produces showy, yellow flowers that are often clustered in inflorescences. It is native to regions of Africa, Asia, and the Americas. Icostegia is often found in moist, disturbed habitats and can become invasive in certain areas.
